content: I adjusted the setting for deletion to be "up to 1hr after posting"
this matches the setting for message editing

given that one could always edit to an empty message...seems ok :)

EDIT: out of curiosity, is there an edit history? (Ah, there is.)

Please note that our archive of Zulip likely won't notice your deletion so of it's something sensitive feel free to reach out to delete something, but ultimately once it's posted it is essentially public.
Hope you don’t mind me trying it out…

free to reach out to delete something

I sent an email to privacy@rust-lang.org about the Zulip archive privacy policy and other stuff on Mar 24, still no answer.
